channel.title: Cfg files not found please help
channel.description:
im trying to get my server im working on to run i currently am stuck because i dosen't find the cfg im on a linux system now on windows it works [code] Start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code] for windows and everything works for ubuntu my run.sh is [code]#!/bin/bash java -Xmx512m server[/code] the error im getting is
../../Config/Item.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Globaldrops.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Doors.cfg: file not found. ../../Config/Shops.cfg: file not found.
if someone could help it would be greatly appreciated ---------------------------------------------------------------------------| PLEASE SOMEONE HELP I REALLY WANNA GET IT WORKING |

item.title: Cfg files not found please help
item.dc:creator: @nath22 nath22
item.description:
@nath22 wrote:

I Am King:

Hmm i dont know much about linux stuff but the cfg files are in the config folder and you must open them with notepad. Other then that idk what to tell ya sorry.

just strange how it works on windows but cant get it to find it on my vps …/ should mean back one directory so should be going back from bin to source and then going to the config while atleast thats what it will do on windows

its a 317 if that helps

please anyone know

Read full topic
